citations.desc: ACCESS AND INSPECTION OF RECORDS AND PROPERTY; SUBMISSION OF ITINERARIES.
citations.narrative:
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 9:45 on
15-FEB-18.
Upon arrival, we knocked on the door to the licensee's home, called the phone number listed and waited 30 min.
We also drove to the facility location at 9:40 and again at 10:30 and waited additional time. Please contact me with
your current hours of availability at 240-381-4110.
Additional Inspectors
Miller Dana, Supervisory Animal Care Specialist

narrative:
2.126(b)                    REPEAT
ACCESS AND INSPECTION OF RECORDS AND PROPERTY; SUBMISSION OF ITINERARIES.
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 9:45 on
15-FEB-18.
Upon arrival, we knocked on the door to the licensee's home, called the phone number listed and waited 30 min.
We also drove to the facility location at 9:40 and again at 10:30 and waited additional time. Please contact me with
your current hours of availability at 240-381-4110.
Additional Inspectors
Miller Dana, Supervisory Animal Care Specialist
